button.name: update_prices
button.help: Recompute all prices based on this pricelist
button.confirm: This will update all unit prices based on the currently set pricelist.

field.name: name
field.filter_domain: ['|', '|', '|', '|', '|', ('name', 'ilike', self), ('client_order_ref', 'ilike', self), ('partner_id', 'child_of', self), ('transaction_authorization', '=', self), ('partner_id.phone', 'ilike', self), ('order_line.tracking_number', 'ilike', self)]

field.string: Latency ffm date less than or equal to
field.name: latency_ffm_date_num

field.string: Latency paid date less than or equal to
field.name: latency_paid_date_num
